doc.field: Hillard's patient records from his practice in Westerly, Rhode Island and vicinity, with notes describing illnesses or injuries, treatments, and results. Inserted or pasted in the volume are temperature charts, birth and death certificates, burial permits, letters from patients, and newspaper clippings. There are also a subpoena ticket and clippings relating to the 1900 legal case of Celine Schweizer, who had an accident on the Pawcatuck Valley Street Railway and at whose trial Hillard testified.

Hillard, William Avery, d.1938. William Avery Hillard casebook, 1897-1903. .1 cubic feet (1 volume) Physician, Westerly, R.I.; M.D., Columbia University College of Physicians and Surgeons, 1893. Hillard's patient records from his practice in Westerly, Rhode Island and vicinity, with notes describing illnesses or injuries, treatments, and results. Inserted or pasted in the volume are temperature charts, birth and death certificates, burial permits, letters from patients, and newspaper clippings. There are also a subpoena ticket and clippings relating to the 1900 legal case of Celine Schweizer, who had an accident on the Pawcatuck Valley Street Railway and at whose trial Hillard testified. Access allowed under terms of Archives & Special Collections Access Policy to Records Containing Protected Health Information. Cite as: William Avery Hillard Casebook, Archives & Special Collections, Columbia University Health Sciences Library.
